short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add smooth page transitions to any website using the View Transitions API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple View Transitions adds smooth page transitions to your web browsing experience using the modern View Transitions API.

While Single Page Applications (SPAs) revolutionized web development, sometimes you just need smooth page transitions. Now you can achieve this with a simple CSS-based solution, powered by the View Transitions API.

Features:
- Lightweight and simple
- Works on most websites
- No configuration needed
- Uses native browser animations
- Zero JavaScript

Note: Functionality may be limited on some websites due to their security settings.

Try it today and experience how modern web navigation can be both simple and beautiful.
